title: Death cams?
body: Im sure people have asked for death cams in the past, But I think it would be a cool way to spend your death time, especially when you have 40+ second time till revive. It could have an X so if you want to exit out so you can watch whats going on in team fights and stuff. But like the last 10sec of your death, being able to re watch that, That would be good for everyone so they can find out what they did wrong, what happen, and made sure that they could fix what they did for future battles.

replies.body: I would just like to know how {{summoner:10}} Revive keeps killing me...
It's Sunfire Cape's passive, if I'm not mistaken.
This would be a great button to click after you die.

If this was an optional thing I wouldn't be opposed to it.  Not for it, simply not opposed.

I would much rather spend my time looking at the items and stats of everyone in the game and watching the enemy team's movements.
This is a really nice idea; you'd get instant feedback on what you did wrong, making you learn quicker. I feel like this could be the death recap 2.0 that riot has been searching for.
This isn't Call of Duty. -_- I always remember how I die, why sit and watch it again?
For the lower elos, They can re watch what the did wrong and correct it. Who knows, It could make the lower elos learn to play better!
So you wanna see Satan{{champion:17}} killing you over and over again? Well i'd be funny for sure!
